name: Annytab Code Prettify
author: A Name Not Yet Taken AB

sections.description: This plugin uses Google Code Prettify with customized styling. This plugin uses the default skin, custom styling has been applied to show line numbers and to prevent line-breaks. The wp-code-block is styled by the theme (borders, background color and more), the contents of the pre-block is styled by css in the plugin.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin and activate it. You do not need to set any configuration options.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 (2020-07-29)

  • Changed namespace.
  • Updated empty line styling.

1.0.1 (2020-07-26)

  • Changed li-styling to override theme styling.

1.0.0 (2020-07-21)

  • Initial release.

short_description: A lightweight plugin that automatically prettifies code in [pre] tags, with linenumbers and without line-breaks.
description: This plugin uses Google Code Prettify with customized styling. This plugin uses the default skin, custom styling has been applied to show line numbers and to prevent line-breaks. The wp-code-block is styled by the theme (borders, background color and more), the contents of the pre-block is styled by css in the plugin.

screenshots.caption: Shows a prettified block of code, highlightings is applied to a <pre> block and <code> segments.
